content.raw:
The skew seems to be parsed correctly:

![svg4.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1066328610-svg4.png)

As a reference, this is how it is parsed on default:

![svg3.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1219214780-svg3.png)

But this file pointed out another problem when trying to extrude it. Gazebo crashes:

~~~

The skew seems to be parsed correctly:

As a reference, this is how it is parsed on default:

But this file pointed out another problem when trying to extrude it. Gazebo crashes:
